extendedInfo.description: If you are Simple Plan's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Simple Plan's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Simple Plan's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Simple Plan's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)--------------------------------Main Features --------------------------------- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics--------------------------------List of albums --------------------------------- No Pads, No Helmets...Just Balls- Still Not Getting Any...- Simple Plan- Get Your Heart On!--------------------------------List of lyrics --------------------------------- Addicted- Anywhere Else But Here- Astronaut- Can't Keep My Hands Off You- Crazy- Everytime- Freaking Me Out- Generation- God Must Hate Me- Gone Too Soon- Grow Up- Holding On- I Can Wait Forever- I Won't Be There- I'd Do Anything- I'm Just A Kid- Jet Lag- Jet Lag (French Version)- Jump- Last One Standing- Loser Of The Year- Me Against The World- Meet You There- My Alien- Never Should Have Let You Go- No Love- One- One By One[Japanese Bonus Track]- One Day- Perfect- Perfect World- Promise- Running Out Of Time- Save You- Shut Up- Summer Paradise- Take My Hand- Thank You- The End- This Song Saved My Life- Time To Say Goodbye- Untitled- Welcome To My Life- What If- When I'm Gone- When I'm With You- Worst Day Ever- You Don't Mean Anything- You Suck At Love- Your Love Is A Lie
